content: this is a character inspired by the pop-tarts man costume that a person was wearing for the pop-tarts bowl back in december for college football this version is of a cherry pop-tarts the icing is made with red crochet cotton held together with pale pink yarn materials worsted weight yarn pale pink buff and red e crochet hook polyester fiberfill tapestry needle red crochet cotton 1 set of 10mm safety eyes
